title: Server transfer RP purchase
body:
Hi! Im a returning player, and want to transfer my account to Latin America South since I live in argentina now.
 
 Right now if I want to purchase RP in the store it gives me options in us dollars, the transfer is 2600 RP, 20 dollars (or 311 argentinean pesos)  on the store gets me 2800 RP.

Now If I try to transfer a Latin America South account to NA  its still 2600 RP, but by spending 300 argentinean pesos I actually get 3450 RP.

I would like to know if i can get the Latin America South  RP purchase options in this account since Im currently at south america and there is a big difrence in RP for the same amount of money. 

All feedback is apreciated, Thanks.

replies.body: We'd like to look into your specific case to see what we might be able to do.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing team can investigate further.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
Thanks, I just sent a ticket, lets see how it goes.
